feedbackItems.utterance: Did you know that when the pest arries to a farm, it gets destroyed and that farmer loses the game?
Keep in mind that the more farmers contribute to the collective, the lesser the probability of pest spreading.
Keep in mind that the less farmers contribute to the collective, the more money they save on their wallets. This increases the probability of pest spreading.
Remember that as farmers lose their crops there are less farmers to contribute to the collective. This increases the probability of pest spreading.
Remember that if each farmer contributes 2GP per year, the risk of pest spreading will reduce to 33%.
Have you noticed the collective has gather on average {collectiveAVG}GP per year?
Have you noticed that each farmer has contributed {farmerContributionAVG}GP per year?
Don't forget that if that the less you contribute to the collective, the higher the risk of pest spreading.
